sentences.english: Grocery stores, for example, will have pricing power they haven't experienced in years.
sentences.chinese: 例如百货店，就拥有几年前没有的价格上的优势。

sentences.english: The busiest shopping area is Oxford Street, where famous large department stores are located.
sentences.chinese: 最繁华的购物区是拥有著名大百货公司的牛津街。

sentences.english: In a big department store， there are numerous departments selling different kinds of goods.
sentences.chinese: 大百货公司里有许多部门分售各类商品。

sentences.english: The department store is selling off its summer stock.
sentences.chinese: 这家百货公司正在举行夏季商品大拍卖。

sentences.english: I will meet you on the right hand side of the department store.
sentences.chinese: 我将在百货公司的右手边与你会面。

sentences.english: Buying Times will help Lotte increase scale in China, which is critical in such a competitive market.
sentences.chinese: 购买时代零售将有助于乐天百货扩大在华业务规模。

sentences.english: Morgan:No wonder the department stores earn billions in a single day.
sentences.chinese: 难怪百货公司可以在一天就赚进上亿的钞票。

sentences.english: Picture showing a departmental store selling Indonesia's made products.
sentences.chinese: 图片展示一间专卖印尼制造之产品的小百货。

sentences.english: The fee for the admittance of commodities to shopping malls is even higher than that for supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 相比较超市，百货商场的进场费还要高。

sentences.english: It's funny because Macy's owns Bloomingdale's.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，布鲁明戴尔本身就是梅西百货公司旗下的。

sentences.english: Unique design, comprihensive top furniture supermarket, leading the new fashion of furniture consumption.
sentences.chinese: 匠心独具，百货式高端家居卖场，引领消费新潮流。

sentences.english: Part Three: Analysis of marketing strategy for Xiamen Hualiann.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分厦门华联百货营销策略分析。

sentences.english: This is a representative of Zhongyou Department Store.
Before the economic reforms, Beijing's largest department store was the Wangfujing Hundred Goods Emporium.
sentences.chinese: 改革开放以前，北京最大的商店就是王府井百货大楼。

sentences.english: I went down to the local kmart and looked for a clothesline and clothespin.
sentences.chinese: 我来到本地的凯马特百货商店，想要买晾衣绳和夹子。

sentences.english: A lot of drop-outs apply for work at the local grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 许多辍学学生申请到当地的百货店上班。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
outlets (loanword)/retail outlet (e.g. specializing in seconds of famous brands)/factory outlet retail store
Wangfujing neighborhood of central Beijing, famous for shopping
